attributes.review: basically took hours to load and when it opened it started glitching so bad and flashing white, blue, red colors which caused my younger sister to have a seizure and now she’s in the hospital. It also takes up wayyy too much space and is completely useless and feeds you utter lies. Thank you for your time ladies and gents 💓
attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review: It was sooo slow I swear my grandma walks faster then this app downloads it was so glitchy and horrible and all I wanted to do was see this about my “NON-RACIST” and” NOT HOMOPHOBIC “ president is up to who also is soooo good on deciding what is right for women even though he is just a man who can barley comprehend anything but hey that’s areeee president and we alll got to deal with-..” I mean LOVE him “ 😞😪😁
attributes.title: ✨HORRIBLE!!!!✨

attributes.review: this app took 30 hours to download. for one app... then once i started it up i wanted to show my support for the orange cheeto pp man himself, Donald J. Trump. unfortunately, the app just crashed on me and told me everything was fine and to go golf while i wait. do not recommend for anyone who has at least one brain cell 👎👎👎
attributes.title: wow...

attributes.review: Complete scam, the app tried making me sign up for multiple subscriptions once downloaded and installed viruses into my phone. I had to cancel my credit cards on my phone because the app took my data, don’t recommend downloading this app at all
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: i’m warning you, DO NOT download this app. it made my phone completely wig out and crash i literally could not use my phone while i had it. and then as soon as i deleted it, my phone was totally fine. i wish i could rate this zero stars.
attributes.title: the worst app i’ve ever downloaded.

attributes.review: Ads all the time, could not get past the first slide without random synthesizers playing in the background. I kept accidentally clicking on ads that led me to corn sites with children on it. All in all, a terrible app. Make the app store great again and put down this app!!!
attributes.title: Terrible, absolute trash!

attributes.review: This app truly proves that apple is just letting any crappy apps on the app store!!! The layout is confusing and messy, the campaign information is lacking even after creating an account. but that’s not even the WORST the hateful ideologies of trump really project an awful image on apple for allowing these messages in its platform. Truly SICKENING!!!
attributes.title: WORST POSSIBLE APP

attributes.review: I’m righting because it was glitching and it would not work on my phone I was trying to open the app and I just closed it ok have a good day oh and thank u for all the pain I’m going through stressing about TikTok and stuff it’s making me more mad at him then before
attributes.title: Worst app delete it right away

attributes.review: This app is terrible. Its buggy, loads slowly and ever since downloading my phone has begun behaving suspiciously. I dont know if this was intentional or a glitch but every time i open the app i keep seeing weird pictures of this racist, sexist, misogynistic transphobic rapist and i dont know how to get rid of that. Please fix. Thank you!
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Not only did this app take a full year to download and take up half of my storage space, but as soon as it downloaded my phone went crazy with random screams of “winning big” and flashes of Cheeto puffs. I don’t know what’s happening but I want it to go away. Whatever you do, don’t get this app.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE
